com.appnexus.opensdk

Class BannerAdView

  • java.lang.Object
    • FrameLayout
      • com.appnexus.opensdk.AdView
        • com.appnexus.opensdk.BannerAdView

  • public class BannerAdView
extends AdView
    This view is added to an existing layout in order to display ads.
    Author:
    Jacob Shufro

      • BannerAdView

        public BannerAdView(Context context,
            AttributeSet attrs)
        Creates a new BannerAdView
        Parameters:
        context - The context of the ViewGroup to which the BannerAdView is being added.
        attrs - The AttributeSet to use when creating the BannerAdView.

      • BannerAdView

        public BannerAdView(Context context,
            AttributeSet attrs,
            int defStyle)
        Creates a new BannerAdView
        Parameters:
        context - The context of the ViewGroup to which the BannerAdView is being added.
        attrs - The AttributeSet to use when creating the BannerAdView.
        defStyle - The default style to apply to this view. If 0, no style will be applied (beyond what is included in the theme). This may either be an attribute resource, whose value will be retrieved from the current theme, or an explicit style resource.

      • BannerAdView

        public BannerAdView(Context context,
            int refresh_interval)
        Creates a new BannerAdView
        Parameters:
        context - The context of the ViewGroup to which the BannerAdView is being added.
        refresh_interval - The desired refresh rate, in milliseconds. By default, 30 seconds. Minimum is 15 seconds. 0 turns auto-refresh off.

      • getAutoRefreshInterval

        public int getAutoRefreshInterval()
        Returns:
        The interval, in milliseconds, at which the BannerAdView will request new ads, if autorefresh is enabled.

      • setAutoRefreshInterval

        public void setAutoRefreshInterval(int period)
        Parameters:
        period - The interval, in milliseconds, at which the BannerAdView will request new ads, if autorefresh is enabled. The minimum period is 15 seconds. The default period is 30 seconds.

      • getShouldReloadOnResume

        public boolean getShouldReloadOnResume()
        Returns:
        Whether or not this view should load a new ad if the user resumes use of the app from a screenlock or multitask.

      • setShouldReloadOnResume

        public void setShouldReloadOnResume(boolean shouldReloadOnResume)
        Parameters:
        shouldReloadOnResume - Whether or not this view should load a new ad if the user resumes use of the app from a screenlock or multitask.
